A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I do not have time or desire to list the countless problems I have with this movie.  Easily the worst Star Wars movie ever\, if you can call it a Star Wars movie?  It felt as though with each passing scene my dismay only grew stronger.  After an epic return to the big screen with The Force Awakens\, I just don't know how anyone who saw this final cut\, agreed to let it represent this epic franchise?  All the tension\, drama and questions generated from Ep 7 were passed by the way side to bring us birds with big eyes and no purpose and crystal foxes that know the way out of a place with no other way out!  What might be even worse is\, I don't know how the recover from here?  They genuinely ruined the story (if this one had a story) and took almost all characters past the point of no return in their development.  The only Solution is a re-release of Ep 8 which reveals\, the whole Last Jedi was a nightmare Luke or Rey had on that island!
